definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
lit. knives rain down from the sky (idiom)/fig. (even if) the sky crumbles
there is no such thing as a free lunch (idiom)
pinyin: tian1 shang4 bu4 hui4 diao4 xian4 bing3

definition: a meat pie falls from the sky (idiom)/to have something fall into your lap
lit. to hold up to the skies/fig. to praise lavishly

sentences.english: Before you can minister to anyone, you must first be able to minister to your heavenly Father.
sentences.chinese: 你必須先服事你在天上的父，才能去服事別人。

sentences.english: The Passion is a high-end club in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 天上人間是北京一家高端會所。

sentences.english: Winter changes the water of heaven and the heart of man into a stone.
sentences.chinese: 冬季把天上的水和人的心都變成了冰。

sentences.english: The country is ruled by a group of army officers.
sentences.chinese: 這位軍官今天上午派遣了一個團的兵力。

sentences.english: The taxi-driver had only three fares this morning.
sentences.chinese: 這個出租汽車司機今天上午只載了三個乘客。

sentences.english: I'm feeling really dopey this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天上午我一直昏昏沉沉的。

sentences.english: 50But here is the bread that comes down from heaven, which a man may eat and not die.
sentences.chinese: 這是從天上降下來的糧，叫人吃了就不死。

sentences.english: I gaze on the moon as I tread the drear wild.
sentences.chinese: 行在陰霾的曠野我凝視着天上的月。

sentences.english: And they prevailed not, neither was their place found any more in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 但牠們敵不住，在天上遂再也沒有牠們的地方了。

sentences.english: You are god give our persent.
The officer detached a regiment this morning.
sentences.chinese: 這位軍官今天上午派遣了一個團的兵力。

sentences.english: Manna was a sweet gum or resin type of bread that God supernaturally sent from Heaven.
sentences.chinese: 嗎哪是一種神從天上降下的甜味薄並。

sentences.english: Your ruling planet Mercury will encounter transforming Pluto this morning from your astrological money sector.
sentences.chinese: 今天上午你的主星水星會刑你的財帛宮冥王。

sentences.english: There was a rare whole eclipse of the sun had happened along the Yantze Rive, China this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天上午在中國長江沿線發生了一次罕見的日全蝕。

sentences.english: Later, people in charge of the sky with stars Ma Bole to call him names.
sentences.chinese: 後來人們就用天上掌馬星伯樂的名字來稱呼他。

sentences.english: The sky a bright moon, video card two Bingxin.
sentences.chinese: 天上一輪明月，映證兩顆冰心。

definition: to descend to the world (of immortals)
lit. to drop from the sky (idiom)/fig. to appear unexpectedly/to arise abruptly/out of the blue/to drop into one's lap
